snippet: Environmentalists discuss the future of energy in the United States....
abstract: Letter from former New Jersey governor and Environmental Protection Agency administrator Christine Todd Whitman responds to Michael Shellenberger's June 30 Op-Ed criticizing California for neglecting nuclear power as clean energy source.
lead_paragraph: Environmentalists discuss the future of energy in the United States.

headline.print_headline: ‘A World That Demands More Clean Energy’
headline.main: ‘A World That Demands More Clean Energy’
